org.homermultitext.citemanager
[Groovy] Class DseManager

java.lang.Object
  org.homermultitext.citemanager.DseManager

class DseManager

A class for managing a standard Digital Scholarly Editions archive.

Method Detail

dseReport

java.lang.Object dseReport(CiteUrn urn)

getVisualInventoryXml

java.lang.String getVisualInventoryXml(java.lang.String urnStr)
Creates the CITE graph representation of all relations indexed to the default image of given text-bearing surface.
returns:
CITE graph XML, with link to XSL for human reading as a web page.
throws:
Exception if DSE relations are not configured, or if urnStr is not a valid CITE URN.
Parameters:
urnStr - CITE URN of a text-bearing surface, as a String value

getVisualInventoryXml

java.lang.String getVisualInventoryXml(CiteUrn tbsUrn)
Creates the CITE graph representation of all relations indexed to the default image of given text-bearing surface.
returns:
CITE graph XML, with link to XSL for human reading as a web page.
throws:
Exception if DSE relations are not configured.
Parameters:
tbsUrn - CITE URN of a text-bearing surface.

imageForTbs

CiteUrn imageForTbs(java.lang.String urnStr)
Searches all index files for a default image for a requested text-bearing surface.
returns:
The URN of the default image, or null if none found.
throws:
Exception if indexes not configured.
Parameters:
urnStr - URN value, as a String, of the text-bearing surface to look for.

imageForTbs

CiteUrn imageForTbs(CiteUrn urn)
Searches all index files for a default image for a requested text-bearing surface.
returns:
The URN of the default image, or null if none found.
throws:
Exception if indexes not configured.
Parameters:
urn - The text-bearing surface to look for.

imageForTbs

CiteUrn imageForTbs(java.lang.String urnStr, java.io.File indexFile)
Looks in an index file for a default image for a requested text-bearing surface.
returns:
A CITE URN identifying the default image.
throws:
Exception if urnStr is not a valid CITE URN.
Parameters:
urn - URN value for the text-bearing surface, as a String.

imageForTbs

CiteUrn imageForTbs(CiteUrn urn, java.io.File indexFile)
Looks in an index ffile for a default image for a requested text-bearing surface.
returns:
A CITE URN identifying the default image, or null if none found.
throws:
Exception if no index files defined, or if multiple default images found.
Parameters:
urn - The text-bearing surface.

imageMapsByText

java.util.LinkedHashMap imageMapsByText(java.lang.String urnStr)
Cycles through all files in textImageIndexFiles, and creates map of text passages indexed to a given image.
returns:
The map expressed as a CITE graph in XML.
throws:
Exception if urnStr is not a valid URN.
Parameters:
urnStr - URN of the image to map, as a String.

Parameters:

returns:
The map expressed as a CITE graph in XML.
throws:
Exception if imgStr is not a valid CITE URN.
Parameters:
imgStr - The URN of the image to map, as a String value.
indexFile - The index file to use.

verifyTbs

boolean verifyTbs(java.lang.String urnStr)
Performs DSE validation for a given text-bearing surface. Checks for referntial integrity across the three edges of the DSE triangle: 1. image to TBS 2. text to TBS 3. text to image Tests currently verify that a single default image is indexed to TBS, that an identical set of text nodes are indexed to TBS and the default image.
returns:
True if all tests pass.
Parameters:
urnStr - URN of the text-bearing surface to validate, as a String value.

verifyTbs

boolean verifyTbs(CiteUrn urn)
Performs DSE validation for a given text-bearing surface. Checks for referntial integrity across the three edges of the DSE triangle: 1. image to TBS 2. text to TBS 3. text to image Tests currently verify that a single default image is indexed to TBS, that an identical set of text nodes are indexed to TBS and the default image.
returns:
True if all tests pass.
Parameters:
urn - The text-bearing surface to validate.
